domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
Nobody needs 5G except the people installing it. It's a solution without a problem. Why do we need it? Give me one good reason. Just one.

if that reason says anything about downloading movies really fast you can just fuck off https://t.co/T0mMImTbVO
